quote: All Fred's taste is in his mouth.
speaker: Ethel

quote: He's put his foot down so many times, I feel like I'm married to a cuban centipede.
speaker: Lucy

quote: I didn’t tell a soul, and they all promised to keep it a secret.
speaker: Lucy

quote: As I recall, it was till death do us part. That event is about to take place right now!
speaker: Ricky

quote: Ever since we said ‘I do,’ there have been so many things that we don’t.
speaker: Lucy

quote: I’m your Vitameatavegamin Girl. Are you tired, run down, listless? Do you poop out at parties? Are you unpopular? The answer to all your problems is in this little bottle, Vitameatavegamin. Vitameatavegamin contains vitamins, meat, vegetables and minerals.
speaker: Lucy

quote: What's the matter with you? Are you crazy or something?
speaker: Ricky

quote: This is Madam Ethel Mertzola. She'll be our medium tonight. She's psychopathic.
speaker: Lucy

quote: Common sense has nothing to do with it. When I say he's wrong, he's wrong.
speaker: Ethel

quote: Look, all I know is that Columbus discovered Ohio in 1776.
speaker: Ricky
